description: This requirement is for providing Goods. Physical delivery is requested at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Quantities are noted below.
full_summary:
### 100 AMP ACOS Supplemental Part Kits Tender

#### Tender Information

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-23-01029493 |
| Solicitation Number | W8482-231258/A |
| Publication Date | 2023-03-10 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-04-04T14:00:00 |
| Tender Status | Expiré |

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of 100ACOS supplemental parts kits. This requirement is for the provision of goods listed below, with delivery requested at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

*   Item 1: NSN: 6110-20-A0Y-3798, 100A ACOS Supplemental Parts Kit
    Quantity Requested: 23
    Unit of Issue: KT
    Delivery to: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
*   Item 2: NSN: 6110-20-A0Y-3798, 100A ACOS Supplemental Parts Kit
    Quantity Requested: 17
    Unit of Issue: KT
    Delivery to: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

#### Contractual Requirements

*   Trade Agreements: This RFP is governed under the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Documents: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   Contact Information: For any inquiries or questions, please contact Mr. Roberto Petrocco at DMarP3BidSubmission-DOMar3Soumissiondesoffres@forces.gc.ca. He can be reached at (101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2). |



---
